My Experience: I Tested All 3 for the Same Project - Here's What Happened

Real testing, not theoretical comparison

I needed a landing page for a SaaS tool I'm building. Wanted to test which AI builder would be fastest and deliver the best result.

Wix AI: Generated site in 45 seconds. Result: "Good but generic." Template felt dated. Spent 2 hours customizing. Still felt like a Wix template. Cost: $17/month.

Squarespace AI: Generated site in 90 seconds. Result: "Beautiful and polished." Layout was professional, typography was perfect. Minimal customization needed. Cost: $23/month.

Framer AI: Generated site in 30 seconds. Result: "Stunning and modern." Looked like custom design, not template. Modern aesthetic, perfect for tech/SaaS. Cost: $15/month.

The brutal truth: Framer won on design quality (9.5/10), speed (30s), and price ($15/mo). Squarespace was close on design but slower and more expensive. Wix felt like the old guard - functional but not exciting.

The lesson: For modern tech businesses, Framer is unbeatable. The designs look cutting-edge, the AI is fast, and the price is right. Squarespace is a close second if you prefer a more polished, less "tech startup" aesthetic. Wix is fine but feels dated compared to the other two.

The framework: Choose Framer for tech, SaaS, startups, portfolios. Choose Squarespace for restaurants, creative businesses, professional services. Choose Wix only if you need specific e-commerce features the others don't have.

When to Choose Each

Choose Wix AI If...

  • ‚úì You need an e-commerce store with payments
  • ‚úì You want the easiest drag-and-drop editor
  • ‚úì You need hundreds of template options
  • ‚úì You want 24/7 phone support
  • ‚úì You're a complete beginner

Choose Squarespace If...

  • ‚úì You're a photographer or designer
  • ‚úì You want beautiful gallery templates
  • ‚úì You care about visual polish
  • ‚úì You need blogging features
  • ‚úì You want built-in analytics

Choose Framer AI If...

  • ‚úì You want the best design quality
  • ‚úì You're building a portfolio or SaaS landing page
  • ‚úì You like modern, cutting-edge design
  • ‚úì You want animation capabilities
  • ‚úì You're okay with a learning curve

My Recommendation

For most people reading this, Framer AI is the best choice. The design quality is unmatched, and the $15-25/mo pricing is reasonable. The interface is modern and the AI generates beautiful layouts.

But if you need e-commerce, go with Wix. If you want gorgeous galleries and don't mind paying more, Squarespace is solid.
